amendment.description: Amendment sought to require an applicant to disclose any intention to use eminent domain for any construction necessary for LNG exports.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 3 printed in part A of House Report 113-492 to require an applicant to disclose any intention to use eminent domain for any construction necessary for LNG exports.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 221 (Roll no. 357).
